body:
Comment 6: 
The tests are run in a goroutine already, and package testing knows about the timeout
flag. The 6.out should time out.

But if you insist, I can do it in gotest instead.

The change I have in mind is to make benchmarks and tests have substantially the same
interface and properties: parallelism, printing, etc. At the moment they are completely
unrelated. I'll open a new bug for that.
